p: Data were plotted and analyzed with GraphPad Prism 8.1 software (GraphPad, San Diego, California). Log-transformed values for viral load data were used for statistical comparisons. For comparisons of multiple groups, two-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by the Bonferroni's post test were used. The differences in values obtained for two different groups were determined using an unpaired, two-tailed Studentâ€™s t test with a 95% confidence interval. Differences were considered statistically significant when the P < 0.05.
